attributes.action: Government to ban all advertising for alcoholic drinks
attributes.additional_details: With the growth of alcohol related illnesses, police incidents, A&E submissions and much more, I think it is time we stopped alcohol advertising altogethor. We have come such a long way with cigarrettes so why can't we do the same for alcohol. Lets think of the children of the future. The government should ban either fully or partially ALL advertising of alcohol, particularly on TV and other media.
